ygData.subject: Re: My thoughts on pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: as long as they don t look at you apprehensively you ll get the best prices, you just need to raise your charisma to get better prices. enchanters and shamans
ygData.messageBody:
as long as they don't look at you apprehensively you'll get the best prices,
you just need to raise your charisma to get better prices.
enchanters and shamans have really nice charisma buffs and charisma jewelry
is pretty cheap
somewhere around 105 I think you'll get the best prices

> From: "Catbik Tinkerton" <catbik@...>

> Also let's find a way to raise our faction with the merchants too so we
pay
> a lot less for those expensive components =) Also note that Merchant
Faction
> only affects the, umm.. "real" gnome merchants, not the clockwork
> merchants... I think
>
> Catbik Tinkerton
> Champions of Brell
> Lvl 30 Warlock
> Bertoxx =)
> PS. I got my skill to 61 last night! Whoo hoo!
